text: The 1948 Saint Mary's Gaels football team was an American football team that represented Saint Mary's College of California during the 1948 college football season. In their first season under head coach Joe Verducci, the Gaels compiled a 4–6 record and were outscored by opponents by a combined total of 161 to 150. ==Schedule== ==References== Saint Mary's Category:Saint Mary's Gaels football seasons Saint Mary's Gaels football
title: 1948 Saint Mary's Gaels football team
